response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I understand its true worth to be $1,000,000 to you. Considering this, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire it at a price tailored to reflect its immense value to you personally. My proposal is to offer the product at $950,000. This price not only ensures a fair transaction but also leaves room for negotiation if needed. I look forward to discussing this further with you.", "product_price": 950000}
